grisu.jcommons.interfaces
Interface GridResource

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<GridResource>
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridResourceBackendImpl
public interface GridResource
extends Comparable<GridResource>

A GridResource contains information about an application on a certain grid-resource with up-to-date information about the grid-resource.

Author:
Markus Binsteiner

Method Summary
 Set<String> getAllExecutables()
          All executables that are available for the application on this resource.
 String getApplicationName()
          The name of the application.
 List<String> getAvailableApplicationVersion()
          All the versions of the applications on this resource.

          The contact string for this resource.
 int getFreeJobSlots()
          The number of free job slots on this resource for the fqan that was specified earlier.

          In order to support multiple GRAM versions for different compute elements

          The job manager for this resource.
